mods.abstract: WSM radio program Pigskin Preview 1949 (part 2), celebrating Fred Russell's Pigskin Preview article in the Saturday Evening Post. Featuring announcer and host Dave Overton with 'Benjamin Franklin' (played by Elmer Alley), writer and producer Noel Digby, and musicians Beasley Smith and his Orchestra, Snooky Lanson, the Dixie Dons, and the Russellaires. With messages from football personalities including Bill Edwards (Vanderbilt Head Coach), Bobby Dodd (Georgia Tech), Bill Stern (NBC's Director of Sports), Bernie Moore (SEC Commissioner), Paul "Bear" Bryant (Kentucky Wildcats Head Coach), Henry Frnka (Tulane Head Coach), Henry "Red" Sanders (UCLA Head Coach), as well as Phil Harris, James G. Stahlman (Nashville Banner publisher), Harry Paxton (Sports Editor of the Saturday Evening Post), and Fred Russell himself.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
